mlflow.rationale: There is no meaningful evidence of MLflow usage, as there are no experiments or registered models, and tracking endpoints are absent.

sagemaker.rationale: There is no evidence of SageMaker usage, including jobs, endpoints, pipelines, or registry usage.

azureml.rationale: No evidence of using Azure ML features such as jobs, pipelines, or endpoints, and no registry usage.

kubeflow.rationale: There is no evidence of using Kubeflow, no pipelines or components present, and no manifests available.

cicd_policy_gates.rationale: There is no evidence of any CI/CD policy gates being implemented, as all gates are marked false.

tracking_maturity.rationale: There is no evidence of metrics logged and only partial artifacts logged, indicating a lack of maturity in experiment tracking.
